content:
I have added two new proposals to the table that implicitly promote democracy and regional stability through manageable projects. These projects aim to foster democratic values and contribute to a stable environment by addressing community needs and promoting inclusive decision-making processes.

| Project Name | Description | Budget Range (million DKK) | Timeline Range (years) | Related SDGs | Potential Partners in Algeria | Potential Partners in Denmark |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Youth Leadership Development | Establish a youth leadership development program focused on civic engagement, critical thinking, and conflict resolution skills | 0.5 - 1 | 1 - 2 | SDG 4, SDG 16 | Ministry of Youth and Sports; Association Tariq Ibn Ziyad (ATZ) | Danish Youth Council; Aarhus Universitet (Department of Political Science) |
| Community Mediation Centers | Set up community mediation centers to provide alternative dispute resolution services and promote peaceful resolution of conflicts | 0.5 - 1 | 1 - 2 | SDG 16, SDG 17 | Ministry of Interior, Local Authorities and Regional Planning; Algerian League for the Defense of Human Rights (LADDH) | Danish Centre for Conflict Resolution; Roskilde University (Department of Social Sciences and Business) |

1. Youth Leadership Development: Create a program that focuses on developing the leadership skills of young people, emphasizing civic engagement, critical thinking, and conflict resolution. By empowering the next generation of leaders, this project contributes to fostering democratic values and a stable society.
2. Community Mediation Centers: Establish community mediation centers that provide alternative dispute resolution services, helping communities resolve conflicts peacefully and promoting a culture of dialogue and understanding. This project contributes to regional stability by addressing potential sources of unrest at the local level.

These two projects can complement the existing proposals in the table, further enhancing their positive impact on Algerian communities and contributing to the broader goals of democracy promotion and regional stability.
